Key Arguments: The proposed ACMA powers would be an anti-freedom, anti-democratic escalation of government control.
Mainstream media and social media already heavily censor contrary scientific and medical opinions.
There is undue influence from large corporations, particularly Big Pharma, on medical governance bodies.
The COVID-19 pandemic response was driven by slogans and fear rather than scientific evidence.
Alternative medical opinions and treatments were unfairly censored and dismissed.
The proposed powers could lead to further censorship of independent media and dissenting voices.
Main Themes: Criticism of mainstream media and government narratives
Concerns about corporate influence on public health policy
Skepticism towards COVID-19 vaccines and pandemic response
Support for independent and alternative media
Notable Quotes: This would be an anti-freedom, anti-democratic escalation of Govt power and control.
Science flourishes best when constantly questioned and challenged.
Please do not allow ACMA to become the ‘Pravda’ of Australia.
Freedom of information and speech needs in Australia is another bureaucratic layer to censor, cancel and malign NCIM.
